Constructor Detail

CFD

public CFD()
Initializes a new instance of CFD class. Both init and exit node are set to null. The list of exceptions nodes is initialized with the empty list.

Method Detail

copy

public CFD copy()
Creates a copy of this graph. Shallow copies of nodes are created, using Node.shallowCopy(), and then connected as in the original graph.

addExceptionNode

setExceptionNodes

public void setExceptionNodes(NodeList val)

sequence

public void sequence(CFD cfd)
Append the given graph to this one. I.e., if this graph has an exit node, it will be pointing to the init node of cfd. The exception nodes will be unioned.

attach

public void attach(CFD cfd)
The given graph will no longer be an independent graph and will be condsidered as a part of this one.

orWith

public void orWith(CFD cfd,
                   javafe.ast.GenericVarDeclVec scope)
A new init node is created for this graph, this node will be pointing to previous init node and the init node of the given graph. A new exit node is created to which the previous exit nodes will point to. Basically, a diamond structure is created from the current graph and the given one. The exception nodes will be unioned.

Parameters:
cfd - a cfd that will be ored with this

andExits

public void andExits(Node e1,
                     Node e2,
                     javafe.ast.GenericVarDeclVec scope)
If at least one node of the two given one is non-null, creates a new exit node and the given nodes point to it, otherwise the exit node is set to null.

Parameters:
e1 - a node that will be connected to the new exit node, may be null
e2 - a node that will be connected to the new exit node, may be null

orInits

public void orInits(Node i1,
                    Node i2,
                    javafe.ast.GenericVarDeclVec scope)
Creates a new init node it to the given ones.

createSimpleCFD

public void createSimpleCFD(Node n)
Initializes this CFD with a single node, that being both the initial and the exit node of that graph, no exception nodes are created.
